"use strict";
const service_request_1 = require("./service-request");
(function (AudioPlayerState) {
    AudioPlayerState[AudioPlayerState["PlaybackError"] = 0] = "PlaybackError";
    AudioPlayerState[AudioPlayerState["PlaybackFinished"] = 1] = "PlaybackFinished";
    AudioPlayerState[AudioPlayerState["PlaybackNearlyFinished"] = 2] = "PlaybackNearlyFinished";
    AudioPlayerState[AudioPlayerState["PlaybackStarted"] = 3] = "PlaybackStarted";
    AudioPlayerState[AudioPlayerState["PlaybackStopped"] = 4] = "PlaybackStopped";
})(exports.AudioPlayerState || (exports.AudioPlayerState = {}));
var AudioPlayerState = exports.AudioPlayerState;
class AudioPlayer {
    constructor(alexa) {
        this.alexa = alexa;
        this._playingStartTime = 0;
        this._playingOffset = 0;
        this._queue = [];
        this._state = null;
        this._suspended = false;
        this._state = AudioPlayerState.PlaybackStopped;
        console.log("CREATED");
    }
    enqueue(audioItem, playBehavior) {
        if (playBehavior === AudioPlayer.PlayBehaviorEnqueue) {
            this.queueAdd(audioItem);
        }
        else if (playBehavior === AudioPlayer.PlayBehaviorReplaceAll) {
            this.stop();
            this.queueClear();
            this.queueAdd(audioItem);
        }
        else Eif (playBehavior === AudioPlayer.PlayBehaviorReplaceEnqueued) {
            this.queueReplace();
            this.queueAdd(audioItem);
        }
    }
    offsetInMilliseconds() {
        return this._playingOffset;
    }
    state() {
        return this._state;
    }
    token() {
        let token = null;
        if (this.playing() !== null) {
            token = this.playing().token;
        }
        return token;
    }
    playNext() {
        if (this._queue.length === 0) {
            return;
        }
        this._playingStartTime = new Date().getTime();
        this._playingOffset = 0;
        this.playbackStarted();
        this.playbackNearlyFinished();
    }
    stop() {
        this._playingOffset = this._playingOffset + (new Date().getTime() - this._playingStartTime);
        this.playbackStopped();
    }
    suspend() {
        this._suspended = true;
        this.stop();
    }
    suspended() {
        return this._suspended;
    }
    fastForward() {
        this.finish();
        this.playNext();
    }
    finish() {
        this.playbackFinished(this._playingOffset + 1000);
        this.queueSlice();
    }
    resume() {
        this._suspended = false;
        this._playingStartTime = new Date().getTime();
        this.playbackStarted();
        this.playbackNearlyFinished();
    }
    playbackNearlyFinished() {
        let offset = new Date().getTime() - this._playingStartTime;
        let serviceRequest = new service_request_1.ServiceRequest(this.alexa.context());
        serviceRequest.audioPlayerRequest(service_request_1.RequestType.AudioPlayerPlaybackNearlyFinished, this.playing().token, offset);
        this.alexa.callSkill(serviceRequest);
    }
    playbackFinished(offset) {
        this._state = AudioPlayerState.PlaybackFinished;
        let serviceRequest = new service_request_1.ServiceRequest(this.alexa.context());
        serviceRequest.audioPlayerRequest(service_request_1.RequestType.AudioPlayerPlaybackFinished, this.playing().token, offset);
        this.alexa.callSkill(serviceRequest);
    }
    playbackStarted() {
        this._state = AudioPlayerState.PlaybackStarted;
        let serviceRequest = new service_request_1.ServiceRequest(this.alexa.context());
        serviceRequest.audioPlayerRequest(service_request_1.RequestType.AudioPlayerPlaybackStarted, this.playing().token, this._playingOffset);
        this.alexa.callSkill(serviceRequest);
    }
    playbackStopped() {
        this._state = AudioPlayerState.PlaybackStopped;
        let serviceRequest = new service_request_1.ServiceRequest(this.alexa.context());
        serviceRequest.audioPlayerRequest(service_request_1.RequestType.AudioPlayerPlaybackStopped, this.playing().token, this._playingOffset);
        this.alexa.callSkill(serviceRequest);
    }
    directivesReceived(request, directives) {
        for (let directive of directives) {
            this.handleDirective(request, directive);
        }
    }
    handleDirective(request, directive) {
        if (directive.type === AudioPlayer.DirectivePlay) {
            let audioItem = new AudioItem(directive.audioItem);
            let playBehavior = directive.playBehavior;
            this.enqueue(audioItem, playBehavior);
        }
        else Eif (directive.type === AudioPlayer.DirectiveStop) {
            Eif (this.suspended()) {
                this._suspended = false;
            }
            else if (this.playing()) {
                this.stop();
            }
        }
    }
    isPlaying() {
        return (this._state === AudioPlayerState.PlaybackStarted || this._state === AudioPlayerState.PlaybackNearlyFinished);
    }
    queueAdd(audioItem) {
        this._queue.push(audioItem);
        if (this._queue.length === 1) {
            this.playNext();
        }
    }
    queueClear() {
        this._queue = [];
    }
    queueReplace() {
        this._queue = [this._queue[0]];
    }
    queueSlice() {
        this._queue = this._queue.slice(1);
    }
    playing() {
        if (this._queue.length === 0) {
            return null;
        }
        return this._queue[0];
    }
}
AudioPlayer.DirectivePlay = "AudioPlayer.Play";
AudioPlayer.DirectiveStop = "AudioPlayer.Stop";
AudioPlayer.DirectiveClearQueue = "AudioPlayer.ClearQueue";
AudioPlayer.PlayBehaviorReplaceAll = "REPLACE_ALL";
AudioPlayer.PlayBehaviorEnqueue = "ENQUEUE";
AudioPlayer.PlayBehaviorReplaceEnqueued = "REPLACE_ENQUEUED";
exports.AudioPlayer = AudioPlayer;
class AudioItem {
    constructor(json) {
        this.json = json;
        this.url = null;
        this.token = null;
        this.expectedPreviousToken = null;
        this.url = json.stream.url;
        this.token = json.stream.token;
        this.expectedPreviousToken = json.stream.expectedPreviousToken;
        this.offsetInMilliseconds = json.stream.offsetInMilliseconds;
    }
}
exports.AudioItem = AudioItem;
